title: A Gentle Song in the Wood

args.text: A quiet glade lies between two hedges, sunlight filtering through the canopy. A small tree stands slightly to the left, its leaves rustling softly in the breeze.

args.description: A soft, melodic hum begins, rising gently in pitch and volume, carrying a warm, familiar tone
The melody continues, flowing like water over stones, with a gentle rhythm that seems to settle the air
The melody shifts slightly, blending with a soft, resonant hum that seems to come from the direction of the tree

args.direction: move slowly toward the tree, hands open, voice steady and low, humming in unison with the melody
args.motivation: to offer comfort through shared presence

args.description: A small shape moves behind the tree, then stops still, a shadow briefly outlined in the dappled light

args.direction: remain still, eyes slightly averted, body slightly tensed as the light shifts behind the tree
args.motivation: to avoid direct exposure to the music

args.description: A faint rustle occurs behind the tree, like a small animal shifting in the underbrush

args.direction: turn slightly toward the tree, sensors scanning the edge of the shadow
args.motivation: to detect changes in the environment

args.description: The rustle stops. A small, quick movement happens behind the tree, then silence

args.direction: pull back quickly, body moving in a soft dash away from the tree, disappearing into the shadows
args.motivation: to avoid being seen by the music
